front.title: Firewall State Update Process for Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: A mobile IPv6 node remains reachable when it moves in a IPv6Internet. However, if such a node, i.e. MN, moves to a network whichis protected by firewalls, the communication that is already existedbefore its moving may be blocked by firewall. The document presents amechanism to update the corresponding access control entry offirewall to avoid the communication interrupted.
